author: jih2nn
content: I've rebased Geth on top of the latest master and it seems now Geth <> Lodestar works. I've ran it multiple times and it went well. This [config](https://github.com/jihoonsong/local-devnet-focil/blob/main/kurtosis/kurtosis.config.registry.yaml) is good cc <@586161934425128960>

author: jih2nn
content: Perhaps we could try out Geth <> Reth? <@1122553751983628349>

author: pellekrab
content: The chain is progressing nicely. No missed blocks so far at 313 blocks. Only Issue I see is 4 slots proposed by reth didn't include the geth TXs. Looking into it
